mapper.insert:
insert into mall_pms.pms_attr_group(attr_group_name, sort, descript, icon, catelog_id) values
(#{entity.attrGroupName}, #{entity.sort}, #{entity.descript}, #{entity.icon}, #{entity.catelogId})

insert into mall_pms.pms_attr_group(attr_group_name, sort, descript, icon, catelog_id) values
(#{entity.attrGroupName}, #{entity.sort}, #{entity.descript}, #{entity.icon}, #{entity.catelogId})
on duplicate key update attr_group_name = values(attr_group_name) , sort = values(sort) , descript = values(descript) , icon = values(icon) , catelog_id = values(catelog_id)
